name: Case Royale
description:
Welcome to Case Royale! This is a new online case simulator.
Collect and improve rare weapons, compete against other players!

In our case simulator, you will find:
*More than 40 cases
*3D skin view
*Online Jackpot! Here you can play with other players for skins. Risk your objects, get everything or leave empty-handed!
*A user-friendly interface
